rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
综合审查发现人工智能对医院效率的影响尚不明确人工智能 (AI) 在医院和患者护理中的使用正在稳步增加。尤其是在放射学等影像占比较高的专业领域，人工智能早已成为日常临床实践的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Compressive-review-finds-AIs-influence-on-hospital-efficiency-lacks-clarity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Compressive-review-finds-AIs-influence-on-hospital-efficiency-lacks-clarity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1792d8cb-1f52-4396-bb35-40b09f15326c Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:51:40 -0400 Comprehensive review finds AI's influence on hospital efficiency lacks clarity
研究揭示了酒精行业应用程序中的误导性做法新研究发现，酒精行业资助的应用程序可能会使用隐蔽的“错误信息策略”，忽略重要的公共卫生信息，并可能“促使”用户喝更多的酒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Research-reveals-misleading-practices-in-alcohol-industry-apps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Research-reveals-misleading-practices-in-alcohol-industry-apps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1663fd20-fe12-4973-b097-ee1fd5052565 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:44:13 -0400 Research reveals misleading practices in alcohol industry apps
研究揭示了保护细胞免于死亡的新分子开关慕尼黑大学大学医院的研究人员发现了一种新的分子开关，可以防止细胞死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Study-unveils-new-molecular-switch-protecting-cells-from-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Study-unveils-new-molecular-switch-protecting-cells-from-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da09433a-59c2-4537-bf01-44c4c8b87ec0 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:39:02 -0400 Study unveils new molecular switch protecting cells from death
于默奥大学发现干细胞分化的关键机制瑞典于默奥大学领导的一项研究提出了有关干细胞如何发育并转变为特化细胞的新发现。这一发现可以加深人们对细胞如何不受控制地分裂和生长从而导致癌症发展的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Umea-University-discovers-ritic-mechanisms-in-stem-cell- Differentiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Umea-University-discovers-ritic-mechanisms-in-stem-cell- Differentiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c795f673-4b50-4f7b-aab2-6eced8a308e6 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:34:30 -0400 Umeå University discovers critical mechanisms in stem cell differentiation
创新的纳米圆盘为深部脑刺激提供侵入性较小的方法麻省理工学院的研究人员报告说，新型磁性纳米盘可以提供一种侵入性小得多的方式来刺激大脑部分，为无需植入或基因改造的刺激疗法铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Innovative-nanodiscs-offer-less- Invasive-method-for-deep-brain-stimulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Innovative-nanodiscs-offer-less- Invasive-method-for-deep-brain-stimulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10d19bab-6d56-4327-a8ac-f318e371cb8f Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:29:30 -0400 Innovative nanodiscs offer less invasive method for deep brain stimulation
蛋白质的发现提供了对骨骼健康和骨质疏松症潜在治疗方法的见解一项新的研究发现，科学家们发现了一种蛋白质，可以通过阻止成骨细胞（成骨细胞）在到达骨形成部位的过程中成熟来阻断它们的活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Protein-discovery-offers-insights-into-bone-health-and-potential-treatments-for-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Protein-discovery-offers-insights-into-bone-health-and-potential-treatments-for-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a65774ef-015c-44dc-b70e-453480f98611 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:22:29 -0400 Protein discovery offers insights into bone health and potential treatments for osteoporosis
研究人员开发创新的小鼠模型来研究癌症免疫疗法免疫在对抗癌症中发挥着核心作用。当前的许多免疫疗法旨在帮助患者的免疫系统更好地识别癌细胞——通过使用工程化抗体——或者简单地为其提供新的细胞，预先准备好寻找和消灭癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Researchers-develop-innovative-mouse-model-for-stuying-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Researchers-develop-innovative-mouse-model-for-stuying-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2282bfce-5b5e-4332-8d06-7c53fa385c97 Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:18:16 -0400 Researchers develop innovative mouse model for studying cancer immunotherapy
创新的组织扩张技术改变了传统显微镜的功能对细胞中纳米级结构进行成像的经典方法是使用高性能、昂贵的超分辨率显微镜。作为替代方案，麻省理工学院的研究人员开发了一种在成像之前扩展组织的方法：这项技术使他们能够使用传统光学显微镜实现纳米级分辨率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Innovative-tissue-expansion-technique-transforms-conventional-microscopy-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Innovative-tissue-expansion-technique-transforms-conventional-microscopy-capability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d06fef7c-5ffe-4290-aeac-3e0f9ceccfdb Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:12:09 -0400 Innovative tissue expansion technique transforms conventional microscopy capabilities
了解精子 DNA 损伤对 IVF 妊娠风险的影响研究人员首次将精子中特定的常见缺陷与妊娠并发症的风险以及对婴儿健康的负面影响联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Understanding-the-impact-of-sperm-DNA-damage-on-IVF-pregnancy-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/Understanding-the-impact-of-sperm-DNA-damage-on-IVF-pregnancy-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8adef4d4-c576-42ad-8aa4-b5bc3a10d07c Sat, 12 Oct 2024 03:05:34 -0400 Understanding the impact of sperm DNA damage on IVF pregnancy risks
InnoProtein 推出可持续替代品 ProteinPioneers在世界藻类日（10 月 12 日）之前，欧盟资助的 InnoProtein 项目将通过发起 #ProteinPioneers 倡议来庆祝这一时刻。欧洲面临着巨大的“蛋白质缺口”，70% 的富含蛋白质的作物和 85% 的大豆需要进口，用于动物和人类消费。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/InnoProtein-launches-ProteinPioneers-for-sustainable-alternatives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241012/InnoProtein-launches-ProteinPioneers-for-sustainable-alternatives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27183188-9bf8-4e48-9430-24b113528dbb Sat, 12 Oct 2024 02:59:56 -0400 InnoProtein launches ProteinPioneers for sustainable alternatives
